title: Assassin's Orbit
description: Golden Girls meets The Expanse with a side of Babylon FiveMurder forces unlikely allies  On the eve of the planet Ileri's historic vote to join the Commonwealth, the assassination of a government minister threatens to shatter everything. Private investigator Noo Okereke and spy Meiko Ogawa join forces with police chief Toiwa to investigate - and discover clues that point disturbingly toward a threat humanity thought they had escaped.  A threat that could destroy Ileri and spark an interplanetary war... unless the disparate team can work together to solve the mystery.
author: John Appel
